publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-3734 Lenzie Academy Wins IET Faraday Engineering Challenge (lodged on 18 March 2009) Elaine Smith*, Ken Macintosh*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Cathy Peattie*, Pauline McNeill*, Sandra White*

S3M-3734 David Whitton: Lenzie Academy Wins IET Faraday Engineering Challenge—That the Parliament congratulates the team of six pupils from Lenzie Academy in East Dunbartonshire on winning the Institution of Engineering and Technology’s (IET) Faraday Engineering Challenge 2009 and notes the dedication and hard work of the pupils, Andrew McCormick, Fraser MacLennan, Jonathan McAuley, Lucy Dewar, Ellis Smith and Sarah Somerville, on the challenge to make a table tennis server using their knowledge and understanding of science, design and technology and maths. Supported by: Margaret Mitchell, Robin Harper, Bill Butler, James Kelly, John Park, Mary Mulligan, Cathy Jamieson, Jamie McGrigor, David Stewart, Bob Doris, Charlie Gordon, Ross Finnie, Trish Godman, Des McNulty, Stuart McMillan, Bill Kidd, Mr Frank McAveety, Elaine Smith, Ken Macintosh, Hugh O’Donnell, Cathy Peattie, Pauline McNeill, Sandra White, Alison McInnes*, Annabel Goldie*
